query.statement:
SELECT COUNT(NUMB) AS TOT_CNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM SAPHEE.ZWBBOARD WHERE MANDT = #MANDT# AND GUBN = #GUBN# AND RAUT = ''
AND TITL LIKE '%' || #S_WORD# || '%'
AND CONT LIKE '%' || #S_WORD# || '%'
UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SAPHEE.ZWBBOARD WHERE MANDT = #MANDT# AND GUBN = #GUBN# #USER_GROUP+#
AND TITL LIKE '%' || #S_WORD# || '%'
AND CONT LIKE '%' || #S_WORD# || '%'
) BOARD WITH UR
